home_subtitle: Start with one page (Ne dominant confirmation). Big text, simple clicks. No dark theme.
home_note: Your answers are saved locally in your browser.
followup_title: If you answered strong (4–5): which examples fit your real life?
followup_note: Pick any that match. Skip if you don’t want to.
screening_subtitle: Answer quickly based on real-life patterns. Higher screening score means “deprioritize this dominant check”.
screening_bias_note: Tip: These groups are unlabeled to reduce bias. Just answer what’s true.
screening_results_note: Lower score = worth checking sooner. Higher score = deprioritize (not a diagnosis).
screening_group_note: Answer based on patterns across your life.
screening_need_answers: Answer at least 1 item (or un-skip) to compute.
